ringenergy-opacity.name: Ring Energy Opacity
ringenergy-opacity.description: Sets the opacity of the Ring Energy Gauge at the lower left of the screen.

hud-opacity.name: HUD Opacity
hud-opacity.description: Sets the opacity of the other HUD elements.

sfx-title.name: Sound Effects
sfx-title.description: Settings for gameplay sound-related features in the mod.

jumpsfx-cube.name: Jump SFX (Cube)
jumpsfx-cube.description: Use the Unleashed jump voicelines when jumping as the cube.

jumpsfx-robot.name: Jump SFX (Robot)
jumpsfx-robot.description: Use the Unleashed jump voicelines when jumping as the robot.

boostvoice-dash.name: Boost voicelines (Dash Orb)
boostvoice-dash.description: Use the Unleashed boost voicelines when using the Dash Orb.

boostvoice-speed.name: Boost SFX (Max Speed)
boostvoice-speed.description: Use the Unleashed boost voicelines when Max Speed (4x) is triggered.

boostfx-speed.name: Boost SFX (Max Speed)
boostfx-speed.description: Use the Unleashed boost SFX when Max Speed (4x) is triggered.

stage-clear.name: Stage Clear Effects
stage-clear.description:
Plays the Sonic Unleashed stage clear SFX when completing a level. 

 Enabling this will cause the level's music to forcefully fade out every time, so that the SFX and music (if enabled) don't overlap with the level music.

results-music.name: Results Screen Music
results-music.description: Plays the Sonic Unleashed results screen music when viewing the results screen.
